statements: SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM reminders WHERE athlete_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, event_date FROM reminders WHERE competition_type = 'Marathon' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, competition_type FROM reminders WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT id, athlete_name, promotion_details FROM reminders WHERE athlete_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND competition_type = 'Marathon' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT athlete_name, event_name FROM reminders WHERE athlete_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT event_name, event_date, competition_type FROM reminders WHERE promotion_details IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(promotion_details) > 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT athlete_name, event_date FROM reminders WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND  '2022-06-30' AND competition_type = 'Triathlon'
SELECT event_name, athlete_name, event_date, competition_type FROM reminders WHERE athlete_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reminder_id, event_name FROM reminders WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, country FROM athletes WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, country FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Soccer';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE athlete_id = 1 ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, country FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, event_name, reminder_type FROM athletes JOIN reminders ON athletes.athlete_id = reminders.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT athlete_name, sport, event_date FROM athletes JOIN reminders ON athletes.athlete_id = reminders.athlete_id WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM reminders WHERE athlete_id = 2;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, event_date FROM reminders WHERE reminder_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM competitions ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, promotion_name, promotion_end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitions WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(reminder_id) AS total_reminders FROM reminders GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, promotion_name FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_country = 'USA';
SELECT event_location, event_name FROM Events WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Reminders JOIN Athletes ON Reminders.athlete_id = Athletes.athlete_id WHERE reminder_type = 'Training' ORDER BY reminder_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM Competitions ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport, athlete_country FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Reminders JOIN Athletes ON Reminders.athlete_id = Athletes.athlete_id WHERE reminder_type = 'Training';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events UNION SELECT competition_name, competition_date, competition_location FROM Competitions;
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM reminders ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport FROM athletes WHERE athlete_country='USA';
SELECT competition_name, competition_location FROM competitions WHERE competition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reminder_id, event_name, event_description FROM reminders JOIN athlete_reminders ON reminders.reminder_id = athlete_reminders.reminder_id WHERE athlete_id=1;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_sport DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country FROM athletes WHERE athlete_country = 'USA';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_end_date < '2023-01-01';
